title: Attack of the Giant Savage Completely Invisible Aliens
description: They’re here! They’ve landed! From the people who brought you Vampire Bikini Girls Suck Paris comes another cinematic masterpiece.
quote: The invisible aliens! Look! There’s one!
altHero: men run down an alley as an alien ship hovers in the sky
alt1: people run away from the alien ship
alt2: the alien ship is getting closer to town as more people run
alt3: a man points and a woman looks frightened
alt4: a group of men and children point at the sky, mouths agape
